1370: Brandekijn moved to Trysgens.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Heilsota at age 18 in 1370.
Had a son with Heilsota, Brandekijn, at age 18.
1372: Had a son with Heilsota, Bartholomeus, at age 20.
1373: Had a daughter with Heilsota, Lenildis, at age 21.
1374: Had a daughter with Heilsota, Volcwiif, at age 22.
1377: Had a son with Heilsota, Eltetus, at age 25.
1378: Had a son with Heilsota, Snelle, at age 26.
1380: Had a son with Heilsota, Jacob, at age 28.
1383: Had a daughter with Heilsota, Aghete, at age 31.
1385: Lost his wife Heilsota while she was giving birth to Alwar in 1385.
1386: Lost daughter Aghete when Aghete was 4 years old.
Lost son Alwar when Alwar was 2 years old.
